org.springframework.web.reactive.config

注释类型 EnableWebReactive


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Documented
 @Import(value=DelegatingWebReactiveConfiguration.class)
public @interface EnableWebReactive
    Adding this annotation to an @Configuration class imports the Spring Web Reactive configuration from WebReactiveConfigurationSupport, e.g.: 
     @Configuration
 @EnableWebReactive
 @ComponentScan(basePackageClasses = MyConfiguration.class)
 public class MyConfiguration {

 }

    To customize the imported configuration implement WebReactiveConfigurer and override individual methods as shown below: 

     @Configuration
 @EnableWebReactive
 @ComponentScan(basePackageClasses = MyConfiguration.class)
 public class MyConfiguration implements WebReactiveConfigurer {

           @Override
           public void addFormatters(FormatterRegistry formatterRegistry) {
         formatterRegistry.addConverter(new MyConverter());
           }

           @Override
           public void configureMessageWriters(List<HttpMessageWriter<?>> messageWriters) {
         messageWriters.add(new MyHttpMessageWriter());
           }

 }

    Note: only one @Configuration class may have the @EnableWebReactive annotation to import the Spring Web Reactive configuration. There can however be multiple @Configuration classes implementing WebReactiveConfigurer in order to customize the provided configuration.

    If WebReactiveConfigurer does not expose some more advanced setting that needs to be configured consider removing the @EnableWebReactive annotation and extending directly from WebReactiveConfigurationSupport or DelegatingWebReactiveConfiguration if you still want to allow WebReactiveConfigurer instances to customize the configuration.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Brian Clozel, Rossen Stoyanchev
    另请参阅:
    WebReactiveConfigurer, WebReactiveConfigurationSupport
